nodes.text: The wedding of the crime boss Valarian and the bounty hunter D'Wopp took place on Tatooine in 0 BBY. The members of Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes and the Human bartender Wuher were among the attendees. In a brawl following the formal ceremony, Valarian killed her new husband because he had shown a lack of respect for her by accepting a bounty on the day of their wedding.
